title: A Thousand Miles from Anywhere Important
description: A Thousand Miles from Anywhere Important is an adventure / travel novel set in the mid-nineties. Join Adrian Osborne as he discovers the world and himself while grappling with the lessons of life as an international traveler. The fast paced dialogue has us running across Europe and the US shouting, "New town, new country!" as our protagonist explores the themes of fairness, inner strength and the impending certainty of death only to realise there are a limited number of events in our life that really challenge us and define who we become.
author: Adrian Osborne
